physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Nystagmus present in both eyes on left and right gaze; bilateral right inferior quadrantanopia; blood glucose level 199 mg/dL (11.0 mmol/L), lactate dehydrogenase level 217 U/L.
MRI scans show two heterogeneous enhancing, well-circumscribed lesions in the left occipital lobe, increased edema on T2-weighted and FLAIR images.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: On follow-up imaging 3 months later, irregular enhancement and mass effect were observed.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: MRI scan showed reduced enhancement in the left occipital lobe, reduced mass effect.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up MRI 1 month later showed a new enhancing mass in the right temporal lobe.
